title: Getting Started with Next.js
author: John Doe
content: Next.js is a powerful React framework that makes building full-stack web applications simple and efficient. {{block name="Top Picks" image="https://picsum.photos/id/7/200/300" products="SKU123,SKU456"}} In this post, we'll explore the basics of Next.js and how to get started with your first project.

title: Building Dynamic Components with React
author: Jane Smith
content: React components are the building blocks of modern web applications. {{block name="Featured Products" image="https://picsum.photos/id/6/200/300" products="SKU789"}} Learn how to create reusable and dynamic components that can adapt to different data and user interactions.
